title: Moon in the blue sky
description: Capturing the image of the moon in the blue sky before full night showcasing contrast of the white spot over blues.
location: Lohit Hostel, Guwahati, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Twilight over IIT Guwahati
description: Twilight in cloudy weather with the sun hidden behind clouds, viewed from Lohit Hostel, featuring Siang Hostel, the cricket ground, and IIT Guwahati campus nestled among surrounding hills.
location: IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Afternoon Clouds over Hills
description: Clouds and landscape viewed from a flight from Guwahati to Bagdogra Airport in the afternoon. Greens, hills, and small water streams are visible. Captured with a Redmi A4 5G.
location: En route: Guwahati to Bagdogra, India

title: Billi the Cat at Lohit Canteen
description: Close-up of Billi, an Indian cat, at Lohit Canteen, IIT Guwahati. Captured on June 27, 2025.
location: Lohit Canteen, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Full Moon over IIT Guwahati
description: Small full moon viewed from Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati at night. Hills, clouds, and the campus are softly illuminated by moonlight and street lights. Captured with a Redmi A4 5G on September 6, 2025.
location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Ducks Returning to IIT Guwahati Lake
description: Ducks returning to the main lake at IIT Guwahati in groups, captured in portrait mode. A few lotus plants are visible around the lake. Taken on July 31, 2025 with a Redmi A4 5G.
location: IIT Guwahati Main Lake, Assam, India

title: Solar System Lamp on Table
description: A small lamp featuring a solar system inside a round glass that lights up, placed on a table. Captured on July 17, 2025 with a Redmi A4 5G.
location: Indoor, Table Setup

title: Full Moon over IIT Guwahati
description: Small full moon viewed from Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati at night. Hills, clouds, and the campus are softly illuminated by moonlight and street lights. Captured with a Redmi A4 5G on September 6, 2025.
location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Joaquin Phoenix Portrait Drawing
description: Black-and-white portrait shading drawing of Joaquin Phoenix (The Joker movie) done on paper using 2B 2mm mechanical pencil lead. Signed by the artist. Created on July 12, 2025.
location: Indoor, Personal Artwork

title: Ducks on IIT Guwahati Lake Footpath
description: Ducks walking on the footpath in front of IIT Guwahati Lake during the monsoon. Captured on May 27, 2025 with a Redmi A4 5G.
location: IIT Guwahati Lake, Assam, India

title: Take-off from Bagdogra with Guwahati View
description: View of Guwahati city during take-off from Bagdogra Airport. Captured from the plane, showing cityscape and surrounding terrain. Taken with a Redmi A4 5G.
location: Bagdogra Airport, India (en route to Guwahati)

title: Ducks at IIT Guwahati Lake (Landscape)
description: Ducks moving around IIT Guwahati Lake in various directions on a sunny day, captured in landscape orientation. Taken with a Redmi A4 5G.
location: IIT Guwahati Lake, Assam, India

title: Post-Rainview from Lohit Hostel
description: Captured on October 1, 2025, after rainfall from Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati. Clear cloudy skies, high visibility, and lush greenery around the hills are visible, with water puddles covering the helipad and cricket ground.
location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Sunny Day from Lohit Hostel
description: Captured on June 7, 2025, from Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati on a bright, sunny day. Clear blue skies, warm sunlight, and lush greenery of the campus and surrounding hills are visible.
location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Kitten at Hostel Door
description: Captured on June 7, 2025, a cute Indian kitten visiting the Lohit Hostel door, meowing and waiting for food. Taken outside the room with a Redmi A4 5G.
location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Scanned Joaquin Phoenix Drawing
description: Scanned version of the black-and-white portrait shading drawing of Joaquin Phoenix (The Joker movie) done on paper with 2B 2mm mechanical pencil lead. Signed by the artist.
location: Indoor, Personal Artwork

title: Sunset at IIT Guwahati Lake
description: Captured on June 7, 2025, from IIT Guwahati Lake. Vibrant sunset colors reflect on the water beside the lake's shore, with campus offices visible on the opposite side.
location: IIT Guwahati Lake, Assam, India

title: Moon Lamp
description: A glowing crystal moon lamp showing the moon’s surface in fine detail, captured at night in my room at Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati. The texture beautifully reflects the moon’s craters when lit.
location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Solar System Lamp
description: A mesmerizing crystal sphere depicting the solar system floating in tiny bubbles of light. Captured at night under soft illumination in my room at Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati.
location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Close Up of the Moon
description: Close up of the full moon captured via ulta zooming resulting in low quality closeup.
location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Glowing Trees at Core III Garden
description: A beautiful view of the Core III garden at IIT Guwahati during twilight, where trees were decorated with glowing lights that illuminated the grassy garden between office buildings. Captured just as darkness was setting in, highlighting the serene and festive ambiance.
location: Core III Garden, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Phuljhadi Sparkles on Diwali Night
description: Close-up shot of a burning phuljhadi (sparkler) captured during the Diwali night celebration at IIT Guwahati’s cricket field. The photo beautifully shows the glowing trails of sparkles shooting from the stick against the dark background of the festive night.
location: Cricket Field, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Decorated Street Lights on Diwali Night
description: Street view from Surjyamukhi Road U-Turn at IIT Guwahati during Diwali night, showing beautifully decorated street lamps, lanterns, and shrubs glowing with colorful rice and fairy lights, creating a festive and vibrant ambiance.
location: Surjyamukhi Road U-Turn, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Phuljhadi Sparkler from Another Angle
description: A different-angle shot of the glowing phuljhadi (sparkler) captured during the Diwali night celebration at IIT Guwahati’s cricket field. The frame captures the burning sparkles spreading out vividly against the dark background, highlighting the festive energy.
location: Cricket Field, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Burning Phuljhadi from Behind
description: A rear-angle shot capturing the moment of holding and burning a phuljhadi (sparkler) during the Diwali night celebration at IIT Guwahati’s cricket field. The glowing sparkles illuminate the surroundings, reflecting the warmth and joy of the festive evening.
location: Cricket Field, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Siang Hostel Decorated on Diwali Night
description: Beautiful view of Siang Hostel at IIT Guwahati during Diwali night, where the entire building was decorated with glowing fairy lights. The cycles parked in the front stand were illuminated too, creating a vibrant and festive atmosphere across the hostel area.
location: Near Siang Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Launching a Red Lantern on Diwali Night
description: A candid moment from the IIT Guwahati cricket field during Diwali night, showing two people preparing to launch a red lantern. The warm glow from the lantern lights up their faces just before it takes flight into the night sky, capturing the joy and magic of the festival.
location: Cricket Field, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Surjyamukhi Road Decorated on Diwali Night
description: Roadside view of Surjyamukhi Road at IIT Guwahati during Diwali night, showing beautiful decorations with colorful lanterns, fairy lights, and glowing lamps on both sides of the street. The festive lights fill the atmosphere with warmth and celebration.
location: Surjyamukhi Road, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Road to Lohit Hostel on Diwali Night
description: View of the road leading to Lohit Hostel at IIT Guwahati during Diwali night, with the Siang Hostel on the right side fully decorated with glowing fairy lights. The bright and colorful exterior created a festive and cheerful ambiance along the entire stretch.
location: Road to Lohit Hostel, near Siang Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

title: Laser Light Show at IITG Lake on Diwali Night
description: A mesmerizing view of the laser light show across the IIT Guwahati lake during Diwali night. The colorful laser beams reflecting over the calm water created a breathtaking spectacle, capturing the festive energy and beauty of the celebration.
location: IIT Guwahati Lake, Assam, India

title: Fairy Light Decorations at IITG Lake Road
description: Street view of the IIT Guwahati lake road during Diwali night, where street lights and roadside lamps were beautifully decorated with glowing rice lights. The sparkling decorations created a warm and festive glow along the entire path beside the lake.
location: Lake Road, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India
